column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////We had a fantastic time celebrating my friend's birthday here last night. We ate at the bar
column2: and had the wonderful Victor as our server. The food was wonderful
column6: and tenderloin with blue cheese. Every dish we ordered was excellent
column7: but it was really because of Victor that I would describe our experience as outstanding. He was friendly
column9: and genuinely cared about giving us a wonderful experience.
